content: उच्चल् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To start, set out; स्थितः स्थितामुच्चलितः प्रयातां <ls>R. 2. 6</ls>; उच्चचाल बलभित्सखो वशी <ls n="R.">11. 51</ls>; sometimes with <ab>dat.</ab> of place; नगरायोदचलं <ls>Dk.</ls> {@--2@} To go or remove away or fly away (from one's place), fly away from; स्थानादनुच्चलन्नपि <ls>Ś. 1. 29</ls>; पुष्पोच्चलितषट्पदं <ls>R. 12. 27.</ls> {@--3@} To free or extricate oneself from.
